body:
Why hello there, everyone.

Just figured after quite some time being away, I'd hop on in and see how everything's going around here. Seems to be in line, and I'm seeing very many new faces on the staff team. Changed a lot, hm?

Well anywho, whoever decides to respond to this; could you give me a brief description as to how Avicus is doing? Also, AMA if you so please. I'll be willing to answer some questions if you've got any up the wazoo.

-Jake
body_tagged:

-Jake
title: 'Tis been quite a while!

replies.body: Where have you been, bb?
replies.body_tagged: Where have you been, bb?

replies.body:
Hey Jake o/

We're currently having Senior Moderator Interviews, and we're half way through our first Tournament. That's it really :)
replies.body_tagged:
Hey Jake o/

We're currently having Senior Moderator Interviews, and we're half way through our first Tournament. That's it really :)

replies.body:
Jake!!! <3
How's it going brother?

Atm, we're finishing up collecting more Juniors, charging through the torunament and are having Sr.Moderator interviews.
replies.body_tagged:
Jake!!! <3
How's it going brother?

Atm, we're finishing up collecting more Juniors, charging through the torunament and are having Sr.Moderator interviews.

replies.body: Oh, you know. I've been venturing off into the world of life. Now I'm trying to find a new job with a decent pay; while finding time to spend with my girlfriend. It's been average, lately.
replies.body_tagged: Oh, you know. I've been venturing off into the world of life. Now I'm trying to find a new job with a decent pay; while finding time to spend with my girlfriend. It's been average, lately.

replies.body:
@Pel: Hey, buddy! That's great to hear, it's good to know that things are speeding up around here. 

@Snow: SNOW! <3 I'm fantastic, thank you! Adding onto my response to Pel, I'm glad things are doing well around here since I've been gone. Keep it up guys, I'm proud of you.
replies.body_tagged:

@Snow: SNOW! <3 I'm fantastic, thank you! Adding onto my response to Pel, I'm glad things are doing well around here since I've been gone. Keep it up guys, I'm proud of you.

replies.body: Well, it's definitely nice to see you again!

replies.body:
Jake!!! Dude, great to see you again, how you doing?? :D

As you've probably already heard Jr Mods have finished and we've moved on the big Sr Mod interview, HYPEEE

Oh and we have a repository just for TDM maps!! Hope you can come back and do yolo shots haha!

replies.body:
Ahh Jake buddy!
What's up? It's Evocal :')
Glad to see you're doing great! Things have been quite enjoyable around here. As for what I've been doing, I have cleaned up the Map Repository quite a bit, as well as messed around with rotations haha.
There's Senior Moderator interviews happening now, and we're in middle of a Tournament as well! Recently we had a Staff Meeting and a lot of things were discussed, too.
As for me, I've been trying to keep my grades high at school (Since I don't live in the USA I get Winter Break that ranges from February to May (In my case I got out of school February 13 and got back in May 11, but it really depends haha).
How have you been buddy? I miss talking to you :')
replies.body_tagged:

What's up? It's Evocal :')

There's Senior Moderator interviews happening now, and we're in middle of a Tournament as well! Recently we had a Staff Meeting and a lot of things were discussed, too.
As for me, I've been trying to keep my grades high at school (Since I don't live in the USA I get Winter Break that ranges from February to May (In my case I got out of school February 13 and got back in May 11, but it really depends haha).
How have you been buddy? I miss talking to you :')

replies.body: I miss you.
replies.body_tagged: I miss you.

replies.body:
@javipepe: I am currently 16 years of age. And nah, it's alright. I did 'tis on purpose <3.

@Spartemex: Hey! =)

@Snoozin: BADER!! <33

@Seth: Ayyyy Seth! Yeah haha I guess my relationship with the staff was pretty close before I left. *cri*

@Porky: I missed you too buddy! Things have been pretty well for me recently, which is a nice change for once. Glad to see things are going swimmingly on Avicus!

@Stormz: Ooh, long time no see man! :D Great to talk to you again! Life has been quite well, how about yourself? How are things?

@alexander: It sure has, alexander. I missed you bunches. <33

@PraecanoVenen: Of course I remember the wedding!! Ooh the memories.. ;-;

@Grape: Ayyy!! I missed you a ton man! <33

@Miracus: Hey! =D

@Kleypex: OH MY SWEET LORDY JESUS IT'S KAMMY. D; I missed you soo much man! Tell Peachy I say hello, and I miss him as well! <3 Great to see you again!

@Utonium: I am indeed from Statefarm. Duhh, can't you tell from my awesome red shirt and nametag?

@Evocal: Oh man, what a pleasant surprise seeing you here still dude!! Good for you in cleaning up the map repository, glad to see a good amount of progress is being made! I heard about the Senior Moderator interviews, and good luck with that! I see you're a Moderator now, so in case you decided to go for it; best of luck! On top of that, good things are coming out of you, Evo. Keep those grades up, and enjoy what life has to offer. As for myself, I've been great. And I miss talking to you as well! <33 Glad I was able to today. Feels good reconnecting with some old friends!

@DictaPip: Oh my lord, Tyler D; I miss you so much man. How's everything been? ;( <3333333333333
